modal_password_reset_description: Did you forget your password? No Problem! Just enter a new password to change {{user}}
modal_auto_renew_description: We're sorry to hear that you're leaving. Your child's membership will expire {{date}}, and will no longer have access to premium game content. Are you sure you want to turn auto-renew off?
modal_chat_description: How would you like {{user}} to chat with other players?
modal_chat_safe_description: Your child can type their own messages
tip_gifting: Gifting is the ability to send avatar accessories or den items to another player within a Jam-a-gram (Animal Jam's in game mail system). With gifting disabled your child cannot gift items to other players.
tip_trading: Trading is Animal Jam's system where players can trade in-game items with one another. With trading disabled your child cannot trade items with other players.
tip_chat: NOTE: All chat messages are filtered by our software to block inappropriate or potentially unsafe language. Our staff continually moderates chat messages to keep Animal Jam as safe as possible.
tip_safe_chat: Safe Chat - Plus Your child can type their own messages
tip_restricted_chat: Safe Chat Your child can Type words from a list
tip_bubble_chat: Bubble Chat Your child cannot type messages
discipline_modal_description: If you have any questions about these disciplines or our policies
discipline_history_disclaime: If you have any questions about these disciplines or our policies, feel free to contact us.
reset_password_description: Need to change your password? No problem! Just enter a new password to change your password.
auto_renew_description: Turn auto renew on to renew {{user}}'s membership on {{date}} for {{price}}
